snippet: The Libyan government has taken back control of its Interior Ministry from an armed group that had besieged the building for a week, an official said Wednesday.
abstract: Libyan government takes back control of its Interior Ministry from an armed group that had besieged building for a week.
lead_paragraph: The Libyan government has taken back control of its Interior Ministry from an armed group that had besieged the building for a week, an official said Wednesday.
